root.name: AOS v3 Atom-Enhanced Foreman v2 Knowledge Tree
root.description: Enhanced root node incorporating AOS v3 atom architecture, evolution from VPorts to atoms, and current system structure

aos_v3_atom_architecture_knowledge.name: AOS v3 Atom Architecture Knowledge
aos_v3_atom_architecture_knowledge.description: Current AOS v3 atom-based architecture standards and implementation

master_atom_registry.name: Master Atom Registry
master_atom_registry.description: Central registry for all atoms in the AOS v3 system

knowledge_items.title: Registry Structure
knowledge_items.content: CSV-based registry with atom_id, atom_type, version, domain, complexity_level, quality_score, hash, registration_date, file_path

knowledge_items.title: Atom Identification
knowledge_items.content: Each atom has unique atom_id with hash-based identification and quality scoring

knowledge_items.title: Registry Operations
knowledge_items.content: Real-time updates, automatic validation, and atom discovery capabilities

atom_json_files.name: Atom JSON Files
atom_json_files.description: Individual atom definitions in JSON format

knowledge_items.title: Atom Structure
knowledge_items.content: Standard structure with atom_id, component_name, component_type, capabilities, functions, configuration, dependencies, resource_requirements, execution_flow, health_checks, endpoint

knowledge_items.title: Naming Convention
knowledge_items.content: Atoms named as {component_name}_atom.json located in AoS_v3/{system_name}/atoms/

knowledge_items.title: Atom Capabilities
knowledge_items.content: Each atom defines specific capabilities and functions for modular operation

csv_runtime_engine.name: CSV Runtime Engine
csv_runtime_engine.description: Master handler for orchestrating atom execution

knowledge_items.title: Engine Responsibilities
knowledge_items.content: Atom discovery, request routing, execution orchestration, performance monitoring, error handling

knowledge_items.title: Integration Points
knowledge_items.content: Integrates with master registry, RAG system, and embedding agents for vector operations

knowledge_items.title: Execution Flow
knowledge_items.content: Reads from master_atom_registry.csv, routes requests to appropriate atoms, monitors execution

atom_discovery_routing.name: Atom Discovery and Routing
atom_discovery_routing.description: How atoms are discovered and requests are routed

knowledge_items.title: Discovery Process
knowledge_items.content: Automatic discovery of atoms from master registry with hash-based identification

knowledge_items.title: Routing Strategy
knowledge_items.content: Intelligent routing based on atom capabilities, complexity level, and quality score

knowledge_items.title: Load Balancing
knowledge_items.content: Round-robin routing with health checks and automatic failover

hash_based_integration.name: Hash-Based Integration
hash_based_integration.description: SHA256 hash-based integration for atom identification and communication

knowledge_items.title: Hash Identification
knowledge_items.content: Each atom has unique SHA256 hash for identification and verification

knowledge_items.title: Message Bus Integration
knowledge_items.content: Hash-based message bus for atom communication and coordination

knowledge_items.title: Point of Contact
knowledge_items.content: Message bus serves as first point of contact for all atom operations

legacy_vport_knowledge.name: Legacy VPort Knowledge
legacy_vport_knowledge.description: Knowledge about the legacy VPort system and evolution to atoms

vport_evolution.name: VPort Evolution
vport_evolution.description: Evolution from VPorts to atom-based architecture

knowledge_items.title: VPort Legacy
knowledge_items.content: VPorts were the legacy calling mechanism before AOS v3 atom architecture

knowledge_items.title: Evolution Timeline
knowledge_items.content: System evolved from VPorts to individual atom JSON files, then to atom registry, and finally to master schemas

knowledge_items.title: Architecture Progression
knowledge_items.content: Progression: VPorts → Individual Atoms → Atom Registry → Master Schemas → Hash-Based Message Bus

vport_to_atom_migration.name: VPort to Atom Migration
vport_to_atom_migration.description: Migration process from VPorts to atom-based system

knowledge_items.title: Migration Strategy
knowledge_items.content: Systematic migration from VPort capabilities to atom capabilities with preserved functionality

knowledge_items.title: Capability Mapping
knowledge_items.content: VPort capabilities mapped to atom capabilities with enhanced modularity

knowledge_items.title: Backward Compatibility
knowledge_items.content: Legacy VPort knowledge preserved for backward compatibility and reference

legacy_capabilities.name: Legacy VPort Capabilities
legacy_capabilities.description: Original VPort capabilities from AOS liftoff

knowledge_items.title: Foreman Master VPort
knowledge_items.content: Original foreman master VPort with orchestration capabilities

knowledge_items.title: LLM Call VPort
knowledge_items.content: Original LLM call VPort with execution capabilities

knowledge_items.title: Headless Cursor VPort
knowledge_items.content: Original headless cursor VPort with IDE control capabilities

system_context_knowledge.name: System Context Knowledge
system_context_knowledge.description: Current AOS v3 system context and state

current_system_state.name: Current System State
current_system_state.description: Current AOS v3 system state and capabilities

knowledge_items.title: Atom Count
knowledge_items.content: System currently has 3,512+ registered atoms across multiple domains

knowledge_items.title: Migration Status
knowledge_items.content: 100% migration complete from legacy systems to atom-based architecture

knowledge_items.title: System Capabilities
knowledge_items.content: Advanced AI integration, neurodivergent-friendly design, comprehensive testing, self-documenting code

atom_architecture_standards.name: Atom Architecture Standards
atom_architecture_standards.description: Mandatory AOS v3 atom architecture standards

knowledge_items.title: Mandatory Standard
knowledge_items.content: Atom-based architecture is the primary and mandatory standard for all AOS v3 components

knowledge_items.title: Gold Star Requirement
knowledge_items.content: Gold Star compliance required for all atom implementations

knowledge_items.title: Architecture Components
knowledge_items.content: Master atom registry, atom JSON files, CSV runtime engine, embedding agent integration

knowledge_items.title: Neurodivergent Design
knowledge_items.content: All atoms must follow neurodivergent-friendly design principles

knowledge_items.title: Advanced AI Integration
knowledge_items.content: Self-documenting code and intelligent error recovery required

knowledge_items.title: Comprehensive Testing
knowledge_items.content: 100% test coverage requirements for all atom implementations
